list_definition.definition: a freshwater fish found in ponds and rivers

list_ex_of_english: He needs broad shoulders to cope with the constant flow of carping criticism and negative positions.
We are not going to indulge in carping criticism.
The speech was largely one of carping criticism of the statements that had been made.
If he is not saying that, he should stop carping from the sidelines.
Above all, the stability which comes from free intercourse instead of from carping at one another from behind walls of any description.
I do not want my words this evening to be in any way carping criticism.
The loss of life in this industry is not a subject for carping criticism.
There should be less carping about quality and more truth about what is happening.
